entry.title: Thursday: Chance of showers. Temperature falling to plus 2 this afternoon. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of showers late this morning and this afternoon. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature falling to plus 2 this afternoon. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of showers. Low minus 4. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of rain showers this evening. Periods of rain or snow beginning near midnight changing to periods of snow after midnight. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Low minus 4. Wind chill minus 8 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Friday: Periods of snow. Temperature falling to minus 10 in the afternoon.
